==Format==
===Round 1 Pools===
Round 1 Pools are Double Elimination Bracket Pools, have one team advancing from Winners and two from Losers into Round 2 Pools. Round 1 Pools do not have detailed results displayed here due to their large number of entrants.

===Round 2 Pools===
Round 2 Pools are Double Elimination Bracket Pools, with three teams total from each pool advancing to the Top 12 Bracket, one from winners and two from losers.
